text: Michał Paluta (born 4 October 1995) is a Polish professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam . In October 2020, he was named in the startlist for the 2020 Vuelta a España. ==Major results== ;2013 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Junior Road Championships ;2015 : 1st 20px Road race, National Under-23 Road Championships ;2016 : 1st 20px Road race, National Under-23 Road Championships : 2nd Overall Carpathian Couriers Race ;2019 : 1st 20px Road race, National Road Championships : 8th Korona Kocich Gór ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2020 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |IP |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male cyclists Category:People from Strzelce Krajeńskie Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Michał Paluta
